name: market for wooden board factory, cement bonded boards | wooden board factory, cement bonded boards | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6542/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'wooden board factory, cement bonded boards', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a wooden board factory, cement bonded boards. The infrastructure represents a medium sized production plant for cement bonded wooden boards using one or several stack-presses. Its lifetime is assumed to be 50 years and its lifetime production volume is 2,500,000 m3 board. The process includes land area, building material needed for building and decommission of the plant.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
